2.text: Hold 2 balls in your dominant hand and 1 ball in your other hand.

3.text: Stand with your elbows bent 90 degrees and your palms facing up.

4.text: Toss one of the paired-up balls into the air gently.

5.text: Throw the ball in your opposite hand into the air immediately after.

6.text: Toss the last ball that's left in your dominant hand into the air.

7.text: Catch the balls in the order you threw them.

8.text: Practice tossing 1 ball back and forth between your hands.

10.text: Try different juggling variations as you get better.
